verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
(Kuna mambo sita,
(kuna vitu sita)
kuna vitu sita
anavyochukia Bwana). x2
Naam viko saba vilivyo
chukizo kwake. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Bwana achukia,
Bwana achukia
Bwana achukia m
a-cho ya kiburi.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Bwana achukia,
Bwana achukia
Bwana achukia
ulimi wa uongo.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Bwana achukia,
Bwana achukia
mikono imwagayo
damu iso hatia.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Bwana achukia
moyo uwazao,
moyo uwazao
uwazao mabaya.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Bwana achukia,
Bwana achukia
miguu nyepesi
kukimbilia ovu.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Bwana achukia,
Bwana achukia
Bwana achukia
ushahidi wa uongo.

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
Bwana achukia
mtu apandaye,
mbegu za fitina
katikati ya ndugu.
